listItemParagraph1: All of our products are 100% ecological and biodegradable
listItemParagraph2: Our methods use 90% less water than conventional methods
listItemParagraph3: Through our partners we give job opportunities to people facing barriers to accessing the labour market
listItemParagraph4: Satisfaction guaranteed or we reimburse you 100%  of your money
listItemParagraph5: You will never be faced with hidden fees, you'll always know what you are paying
listItemParagraph6: Our trained technicians use the latest techniques and the best tools in the field
